short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check for, download and install the latest stable Iron revisions

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to check for, download and install the latest revisions of the "SRWare Iron"-Browser. The extension supports Windows / Linux and Mac Builds (32 and 64 bit)
